main event: An object was observed over Port Said, Egypt, in September 1962, trailing a white smoke trail.
interesting points: The object was approximately 51,000 ft high and visible for about 45 minutes,Photographs of the smoke trail were taken,The observation duration was recorded as 55 seconds,There were reports of a luminous object falling into the Mediterranean Sea after being sighted at approximately 31,000 feet,The object left a smoke trail that was visible for five minutes after descent.
sighted object: a luminous object trailing a white smoke trail
